member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the target type of actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.Undefined
member.summary: Intended for either Users or Groups.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.User
member.summary: Intended for just Users.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ActorType.Group
member.summary: Intended for just Groups.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType
member.summary: Enum for selecting target comparison between current value and target value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Equals
member.summary: Current and target are equal in value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.NotEqual
member.summary: Current and target are not equal in value.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Greater
member.summary: Current is greater in value than the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.GreaterOrEqual
member.summary: Current is greater than or equal to the value of the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.Less
member.summary: Current is less than the value of the target.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.ComparisonType.LessOrEqual
member.summary: Current is less than or equal to the value of the target.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType
member.summary: Enum for selecting what values will be used to query if criteria is met.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Any
member.summary: Check if any singular piece of GameData matches the criteria.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Sum
member.summary: Check if a sum of all GameData for that key matches the crteria (Long and Float only).

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaQueryType.Latest
member.summary: Check if the most recent piece of GameData matches the criteria.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope
member.summary: Enum for selecting if GameData is to checked against just the actor in question or other actors relating to them (i.e. group members)

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope.Actor
member.summary: Test the criteria against the specified actor

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.CriteriaScope.RelatedActors
member.summary: Test the criteria against the specified actors relations ie. a users friends, or a groups members

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria
member.summary: Encapsulates requirements for completing an achievement or skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Key
member.summary: The key which will be queried against to check if criteria is met.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.DataType
member.summary: GameDataType of the key which is being queried.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.CriteriaQueryType
member.summary: Which stored GameData will be queried.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.ComparisonType
member.summary: How the target value and the actual value will be compared.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Scope
member.summary: Whether the criteria will be checked against the actor or related actors (i.e. group members, user friends).

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationCriteria.Value
member.summary: The value which will compared against in order to see if the criteria has been met.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the category of evaluation being stored or looked for.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType.Achievement
member.summary: Achievement evaluation type

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.EvaluationType.Skill
member.summary: Skill evaluation type

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the type of data being stored or looked for.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.String
member.summary: A non-numeric set of characters.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Long
member.summary: Numeric value with no decimal places.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Float
member.summary: Numeric value with decimal places.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.GameDataType.Boolean
member.summary: True or false.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType
member.summary: Enum for selecting subsection of users for current standings of a leaderboard.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Top
member.summary: Provides standings based off the global ranking of the leaderboard.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Near
member.summary: Provides standings in relation to the actorId provided.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.Friends
member.summary: Provides only the standings of those who are friends of the actorId provided.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardFilterType.GroupMembers
member.summary: Provides only the standings of those who are members of the actorId provided.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType
member.summary: Enum for selecting the type and sorting order of the leaderboard being created.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Highest
member.summary: Sort by the highest GameData values for a key. Only the highest is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Lowest
member.summary: Sort by the lowest GameData values for a key. Only the lowest is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Cumulative
member.summary: Sort by the highest sum of GameData values for a key for an actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Count
member.summary: Sort by the highest count of a GameData key for an actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Earliest
member.summary: Sort by the earliest occurence of a GameData key. Only the earliest 'DateCreation' is taken for each Actor.

member.name: F:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.LeaderboardType.Latest
member.summary: Sort by the most recent occurence of a GameData key. Only the most recent 'DateModified' is taken for each Actor.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward
member.summary: Encapsulates the reward given for completing an achievement or skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Common.Shared.Reward.Key

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates achievement/skill details.
member.example: JSON { Token : "AN_ACHIEVEMENT_TOKEN", GameId : 1, Name : "Achievement Unlocked", Description : "Fulfil the criteria to get the reward", ActorType : "User", EvaluationCriteria : [{ Key : "Criteria Key", DataType : "Long", CriteriaQueryType : "Any", ComparisonType : "Equals", Scope : "Actor", Value : "5" }], Reward : [{ Key : "Reward Key", DataType : "Float", Value : "10.5" }] }

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.Token
member.summary: A unique identifier used in development to reference the achievement/skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.GameId
member.summary: The ID of the Game which this achievement/skill should belong to. Can be left null to make the achievement/skill system-wide.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.Name
member.summary: The display name for the achievement/skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.Description
member.summary: The description of the achievement/skill.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.ActorType
member.summary: The type of actor which this achievement/skill is intended to be completed by.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.EvaluationCriterias
member.summary: A list of criteria which will be checked in order to see if an actor has completed the achievement/skill. Must contain at least one criteria.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCreateRequest.Rewards
member.summary: A list of rewards that will be provided to the actor upon completion of the achievement/skill criteria. An achievement does not need to contain a reward.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCriteriaCreateRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates requirements for completing an achievement or skill.
member.example: JSON { Key : "GameData Key", DataType : "String", CriteriaQueryType : "Any", ComparisonType : "Equals", Scope : "Actor", Value : "GameData Key Value" }

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.EvaluationCriteriaResponse
member.summary: Encapsulates requirements for completing an achievement or skill.
member.example: JSON { Key : "GameData Key", DataType : "String", CriteriaQueryType : "Any", ComparisonType : "Equals", Scope : "Actor", Value : "GameData Key Value" }

member.summary: Encapsulates requirements for completing an achievement or skill.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates leaderboard details.
member.example: JSON { Token : "THE_LEADERBOARD_TOKEN", GameId : 1, Name : "Leaderboard Name", Key : "Key", ActorType : "User", GameDataType : "Long", CriteriaScope : "Actor", LeaderboardType : "Highest" }

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.Token
member.summary: A unique identifier used in development to reference the leaderboard.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.GameId
member.summary: The Id of the Game which this leaderboards belongs to. Can be left null to relate this leaderboard to the system rather than a game. This Id is also used when gathering GameData using the Key provided.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.Name
member.summary: The display name of the leaderboard.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.Key
member.summary: The GameData key which is checked against in order to create the leaderboard standings.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.ActorType
member.summary: The type of actor which this leaderboard is intended for.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.GameDataType
member.summary: The GameDataType of the GameData being checked against.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.CriteriaScope
member.summary: Whether the criteria will be checked against the actor or relatedactors (i.e. group members, user friends).

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardRequest.LeaderboardType
member.summary: The method which data will be collected and sorted for this leaderboard.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse
member.summary: Encapsulates leaderboard details returned from the server.
member.example: JSON { Token : "THE_LEADERBOARD_TOKEN", GameId : 1, Name : "Leaderboard Name", Key : "Key", ActorType : "User", GameDataType : "Long", CriteriaScope : "Actor", LeaderboardType : "Highest" }

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.Token
member.summary: The unique identifier used in development to reference the leaderboard.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.GameId
member.summary: The Id of the game which this leaderboard belongs to.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.Name
member.summary: The display name of the leaderboard.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.Key
member.summary: The GameData key which is checked against in order to create the leaderboard standings.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.ActorType
member.summary: The type of actor which this leaderboard is intended for.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.GameDataType
member.summary: The GameDataType of the GameData being checked against.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.CriteriaScope
member.summary: Whether the criteria is checked against the actor or relatedactors (i.e. group members, user friends).

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardResponse.LeaderboardType
member.summary: The method which collects data and sorts it for this leaderboard.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest
member.summary: Encapsulates leaderboard current standings request.
member.example: JSON { LeaderboardToken : "AN_ACHIEVEMENT_TOKEN", GameId : 1, ActorId : 1, LeaderboardFilterType : "Near", Limit : 10, Offset : 0, DateStart : "2016-01-01 00:00:00", DateEnd : "2016-12-31 23:59:59" }

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.LeaderboardToken
member.summary: The Token of the Leaderboard which the standings are being gathered for.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.GameId
member.summary: The Id of the Game the leaderboard. Can be left null for system-wide leaderboards.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.ActorId
member.summary: The Id of an Actor. Required for getting standings for Near, Friends (user only) and Group Members (group only)

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.LeaderboardFilterType
member.summary: The filter for what standings will be returned.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.PageLimit
member.summary: The maximum number of results which will be returned.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.PageOffset
member.summary: The set of results which will be returned based on the limit. 0 returns the first set of results for Top, Friends and Group Member and the nearest range for Near.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.DateStart
member.summary: The earliest point which data should be collected from. Can be left null to set no earliest point.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsRequest.DateEnd
member.summary: The latest point which data should be collected from. Can be left null to gather all data up to the present time.

member.name: T:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsResponse
member.summary: Encapsulates leaderboard standings details from the database.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsResponse.ActorId
member.summary: The Id of the Actor.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsResponse.ActorName
member.summary: The name of the Actor.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsResponse.Value
member.summary: The value returned from the query for the leaderboard.

member.name: P:PlayGen.SUGAR.Contracts.Shared.LeaderboardStandingsResponse.Ranking
member.summary: The actor's global ranking within that leaderboard.
